Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Southbound Reroute near Cicero/16th
ShortDescription: Southbound 54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, 16th, Kostner, Cermak and Cicero: due to, street blockage near Cicero/16th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, 16th, Kostner, Cermak and Cicero: due to, street blockage near Cicero/16th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
